p: At the time of submitting this manuscript, the YEFE main study had completed recruitment (n=960) and one-year follow-up at both sites and laboratory analysis was ongoing. YEFE sub-studies recruiting adults living with HIV in Kilifi (n=250) and children 9 months to <5 years in Mbarara (n=420) had completed recruitment and 28 days follow-up visits. The NIFTY study had just begun in Kilifi, Kenya and Mbarara, Uganda, after having obtained all approvals.
